tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: She is very friendly, helpful and understanding. I went multiple times with different issues. She listened to all my problems, did a thorough checkup and provided clear explanation.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
context: Pregnancy Check Up,Pregnancy Tests,Labor and Delivery,Family Planning,
review: I Jayashree, I found Dr Nagarathna D S in practo website and gone through Dr profile and I visited for pregnancy routine consultation. Dr Nagarathna madam treated me friendly and listens all problems carefully and gave solution. The entire journey from consultation to till delivery and discharge went very well. During my growth scan Dr found that baby weight is less and suggested medication and gave confidence by the the time of delivery baby weight came to normal. Appollo Cradle Koramangala hospital is really good in terms of facilities, pediatrician Dr Harish N, Dr Mamatha R and staffs are really caring and nursing staff are excellent they will take care everything and the hospital quotation is correctly suited that your in safe hand. ******* * ***** **** ** ******* ** ********** ***** ** *** ** *** **** ************* One best thing is Dr gives confidence and strength to patients. Last but not least I saw in Dr is  "Vidyo Narayano harihi".

Doctor is very friendly, she treats her patients like her family members. Maximum she ll try for normal delivery. Now a days doctors won't wait for normal delivery, but she will try to do normal delivery till last moment.  In my case I only opted c section, as I couldn't bear.

I was appalled by the way this doctor treated me when I went for a consultation at Apollo clinic in Koramangala. She showed up late by over 40 minutes to both appointments **** *** ****** **** **** *** *** ***** * *********** **** **** **** *** ******** And to make things worse, I was treated very rudely and disrespectfully by her. The first time it was just me, she didn't bother to ask me my name.. and when I was explaining to her what the problem was she rudely cut me off, to ask me questions about my age etc, without even looking at my face. Then she told me to lose weight (which is fine), but when I asked her for advice on how to lose weight, she didn't even bother to look up from her phone and told me very impolitely and haughtily that there is no magic pill for weight loss (I'm well aware of this, but a doctor's opinion is valued). *** ****** ** ***** *** ******* this time I took my mother with me, as after the first visit I went home almost in tears because of the way I was treated. She wouldn't allow my mother to enter the consultation room, so my mother said she will wait outside the door. In response, the doctor asked me and my mother if we understand English. At this, I lost my temper and gave her a piece of my mind. She did look at my test results and give me a prescription, *** * ** **** ***** *** * *** ****** *** ****** **** Overall it was a very unpleasant experience *** ** ***** ** *** ****** **** *** ****** ***** * ** ***** ******** Visiting a hospital is stressful as it is, *** ******* **** *********** **** *** ******* * *** **** ******* **** ********** * **** doctor will put your mind at ease and comfort you in addition to treating your illness, and going by those standards, ********** ** *** * **** ******* Please avoid this doctor.

My wife had visited the hospital and consulted the doctor for a gynae issue. ********* *** **** ** ******* I would like to recommend this doctor to my family and friends. Medical tests were recommended but we didn't do them. There was no waiting time in the hospital when we went. Diet was suggested.

She is very caring Doctor. She will Always be helpful when you feel lonely. She will listen to all your problems and help you to deal with it. She will scold like a mother when we are not following what is needed to follow. She was my First genecology in Bangalore when I conceived for the first time and she took very good care of me. I have not visited to any other doctor after her. Thank you so much Doctor!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
For Anybody who’s visiting a gynaecologist for the first time and worried, she’s the best person to go to. She’s friendly and supportive and makes you feel comfortable to speak about any issues that you are facing. Very hygienic and clean procedures. Would definitely recommend to those in need. She’s amazing.
Thank you :)

Best Experinece with Dr.Nagarthana DS.Thank you for taking care of my wife and for all that you did to deliver my baby.She is such an humble doctor and had lots of patience to listen.Thank you from the core by the kindness and professional manner was taken.Sonali & Abhishek
She is very good, understands the problem, and has been given options for treatment. Also, she has given the view as best suited to patients based on age and condition
